section.name: HST Configuration in hst.properties
section.p: Usually the main configuration file is /WEB-INF/hst.properties. It is set up as context parameter in the web.xml file, see here. Configuration properties are documentated within the file. This is the default configuration file:
section.source:
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ # # Hippo Site Toolkit Main Configuration # # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ # Repository Configuration. # # The address of the repository and the user name and password # to use for the repository login. All required. repository.address=rmi://localhost:1099/hipporepository #repository.address=WEB-INF/storage repository.user.name=admin repository.password=admin
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
